ygData.subject: Re: Cindra's Charismatic Carrilon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... At L42, I tried Carrilon on the brownie guards.  Took them from threatening to dubious.  I then waltzed into the village and looked around.  The merchants
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 9 Jan 2000 silky@... wrote:
>
> Methinks you got a little lucky - brownies hate EVERYONE - and they are
> NASTY NASTY beasts.
>
> Enchanters have to buy their new potion spells there - let me tell you,
> that in itself was an adventure.

At L42, I tried Carrilon on the brownie guards. Took them
from threatening to dubious. I then waltzed into the village
and looked around. The merchants wouldn't sell to me. I
could've tried the sneak trick, but didn't want to risk it
somehow making me KOS to the guards again.

I wasn't able to do this when I was around L20. They stayed
threatening to me.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
